description:
Showcase of a Custom Schema-Validator executed in the cluster.

It will check that the entered names are unique (case insensitive) across all entries in this multi-object schema.

For the Java implementation check out [ExampleSchemaValidatorSchema.java](https://bitbucket.lab.dynatrace.org/projects/RX/repos/cluster/browse/shared/settings.monitoring.impl/src/main/java/com/dynatrace/settings/monitoring/impl/internalapi/schemas/customvalidation/ExampleSchemaValidatorSchema.java)
